src:
Hari Ini, 33 Tahun yang Lalu, Alex Ferguson Membangun Dinasti Kesuksesan di Old Trafford
06 Nov 2019, 21:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Tanggal 6 November merupakan tanggal yang sangat bersejarah untuk Manchester United. Hari ini, tepat 33 tahun yang lalu, mereka resmi memperkenalkan Alex Ferguson sebagai manajer mereka.
Pelatih bernama Alexander Chapman Ferguson itu dikenal sebagai manajer legendaris Manchester United. Ia juga menjadi manajer terlama yang pernah menangani Manchester United.



Sebelum menangani United, Fergie dikenal menangani klub asal Skotlandia, Aberdeen. Ia membuat klub itu memangnkan tiga gelar juara Liga Skotlandia, empat Piala Skotlandia dan satu Piala Winner.
Pada tanggal 6 November ia resmi diperkenalkan kepada publik sebagai pengganto Rpm Atkinson. Pelatih asal Inggris itu resmi dipecat setelah United berada di ambang degradasi.

Simak Catatan menarik mengenai karir Sir Alex Ferguson di United di bawah ini.
text:
Today, 33 Years Ago, Alex Ferguson Built a Success Dynasty at Old Trafford
Nov 6 2019, 21:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - November 6 is a very historic date for Manchester United. Today, exactly 33 years ago, they officially introduced Alex Ferguson as their manager.
The coach named Alexander Chapman Ferguson was known as the legendary manager of Manchester United. He is also the longest manager ever to deal with Manchester United.



Before handling United, Fergie was known to handle a Scottish club, Aberdeen. He made the club indeed three Scottish League titles, four Scottish Cups and one Cup Winner.
On November 6, he was officially introduced to the public as a substitute for Rp. Atkinson. The Englishman was officially fired after United were on the verge of relegation.

Check out an interesting note about Sir Alex Ferguson's career at United below.
